name: Monotheism
description: The belief in a single, all-powerful, and transcendent God.

name: Covenant
description: The concept of the covenant (brit) between God and the Jewish people.

name: Torah and revelation
description: The Torah, comprised of the Five Books of Moses, considered to be the revealed word of God, containing the commandments and teachings that guide Jewish life.

name: Halakha (Jewish law)
description: Halakha, the system of Jewish law, derived from the Torah.
